column1: Baby Barnaby's////I consider the following items when rating restaurants that I try for the first time: facility/location
column4: and food. I took off one star because our waitress did not provide the level of service we typically see elsewhere. We had breakfast here on a weekday morning
column5: and there was plenty of available seating in this tiny restaurant. I ordered the green eggs
column6: and they were delicious. The breakfast portion was big with sausage
column8: and toast. The restaurant was clean including the bathroom. Our server seemed more interested in side work than actually conversing with customers though.
